title: PowerApps SQL LookUps and Relationships
excerpt: In this video, you will learn about setting and using PowerApps SQL Lookups and Relationships. If you have a proper key structure in SQL and you need to learn how to make it work in PowerApps then this is the video for you.   Getting started with SQL and PowerApps - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CO6xfbjnYwc
